document.heading: Center for Public Administration and Service, Inc., Real Property Tax Exemption Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-125, the “Center for Public Administration and Service, Inc., Real Property Tax Exemption Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-279, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first, amended first and second readings on March 1, 1988, March 15, 1988 and March 29, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 7, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-172 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
